author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #38346

#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_4_X`.

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2282](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2282): [EXO] PFMETNoMu trigger with HF cleaning + low-pT double-photon triggers _(2nd and last part of the integration)_
  - [CMSHLT-2317](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2317): [BPH] new triggers for Bs->MuMuGamma search _(currently disabled, i.e. PS=0)_
  - [CMSHLT-2327](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2327): [BPH] new dimuon triggers for Upsilon and PsiPrime analyses _(currently disabled, i.e. PS=0)_
  - [CMSHLT-2328](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2328): [BPH] new trigger for Bc-meson spectroscopy _(currently disabled, i.e. PS=0)_
  - [CMSHLT-2333](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2333): [EGM,HIG] Naming: removed "`NoPixelVeto`" label from Diphoton Paths _(2nd and last part of the integration)_
  - [CMSHLT-2337](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2337): [MUO] Removal of 2 deprecated MC triggers of MUO POG
  - [CMSHLT-2339](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2339): [ECAL,TSG] Update HLT customisation for 2018 Data with ECAL UL calibrations (done in e8ada551bf2aad7a69462b757d52af59c822e39b)

`HLT/V62` also includes an update as part of [CMSHLT-2261](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2261), changing the prescale (PS) of the Path `HLT_DoubleMu4_3_Jpsi_v` from 20 to 10 (but PS changes are not tracked in CMSSW, and are thus not visible in this PR).

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

#38346

Development of HLT menus for 2022 pp data-taking.
title: HLT menu development for `12_4_X` (3/N)
